Motor Vehicle Registration
A Government Platform

Role: Senior UX/UI Designer

Skills: Mock-ups, UX, Design System, Prototypes

Period: Apr 2023 - Jul 2024

Cotractor: Develit AB



CHALLENGE

Design a family of government services to be easy to work with.



PROJECT DESCRIPTION

This is a government platform which makes possible to manage the whole life circle of any motor vehicle whithin a country.



WHAT'VE BEEN DONE

Year 2023

First year of the project, I was involved in creating the foundation and lots of MVPs:


- Motor Vehicle Verification - a service to check vehicles and put them into DB;

- Motor Vehicle Registration - a service to enroll vehicles, people and organmizations to the system, then its full life-cicle management and services;

- Stock Control (Wharehouse Managent System) - 'Orders' component of the system, to manage stock and trasfer/deliver products. Including a service for a whole chain of manager-picker-packer-deliver control and cooperation.

- work on Design System etc.


Year 2024

Second year of the project, I was involved in tuning, polishing main features and create new ones:


- Motor Vehicle Verification - rework of the 'Form' (main feature of the service). Photo/file Uploader improvments;

- Motor Vehicle Registration - 'Booking' feature UI/UX improvments based on requested changes;

- Stock Control (Wharehouse Managent System) - 'Order Picking', a feature for wharehouse staff to pick, pack and send the orders. 'Create Order' feature UI/UX improvments. 'Specific Order' feature creation;

- lots of small UI/UX improments;

- continous work on Design System etc.
